pullrequest.title: Update gzprop to output zip files.

content.raw:
I'm getting a console error and then the program hangs:
~~~
# starting within gazebo_models folder
$ gzprop $PWD/cart_rigid_suspension/
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::bad_alloc'
  what():  std::bad_alloc
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~
Then I give a `Ctrl+C`:
~~~
^C/var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/deflater.rb:16:in `deflate': Interrupt
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/deflater.rb:16:in `<<'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/output_stream.rb:176:in `<<'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/ioextras/abstract_output_stream.rb:9:in `write'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/ioextras.rb:10:in `copy_stream'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/entry.rb:543:in `block in write_to_zip_output_stream'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/entry.rb:486:in `open'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/entry.rb:486:in `get_input_stream'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/entry.rb:543:in `write_to_zip_output_stream'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/file.rb:304:in `block (3 levels) in commit'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/entry_set.rb:42:in `call'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/entry_set.rb:42:in `block in each'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/entry_set.rb:41:in `each'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/entry_set.rb:41:in `each'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/file.rb:303:in `block (2 levels) in commit'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/output_stream.rb:52:in `open'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/file.rb:302:in `block in commit'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/file.rb:407:in `on_success_replace'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/file.rb:301:in `commit'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/file.rb:325:in `close'
	from /var/lib/gems/1.9.1/gems/rubyzip-1.1.6/lib/zip/file.rb:101:in `open'
	from /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/devel_isolated/gazebo/bin/gzprop:65:in `block in <main>'
	from /usr/lib/ruby/1.9.1/tmpdir.rb:83:in `mktmpdir'
	from /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/devel_isolated/gazebo/bin/gzprop:49:in `<main>'


~~~
content.html:
I'm getting a console error and then the program hangs:

# starting within gazebo_models folder
$ gzprop $PWD/cart_rigid_suspension/
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::bad_alloc'
  what():  std::bad_alloc
Aborted (core dumped)

Then I give a Ctrl+C:
